QuestData.Title: The Restless Dead
QuestData.Description: Not all of our soldiers made it out of Scourgeholme. Many were slain and turned into twisted reflections of their former selves. Such is the way of the Scourge. For those damned souls, there is no eternal peace. We must provide their souls rest.$B$BTravel through the Breach into Scourgeholme and slay the skeletal reanimated crusaders. Sprinkle this holy water on their bones so that their spirits may be freed.
QuestData.LogDescription: Father Gustav at the Valley of Echoes in Icecrown wants you to use Holy Water on the corpses of Reanimated Crusaders to free 10 restless souls.
QuestData.CompletionText: It is a grim task, $n, but it must be done.
QuestData.RewardText: The path of the righteous crusader is one beset by inequity and evil. To cut through the middle is the only salvation. You have done that on this day and much more.
